Hello all,

I've recently completed my Master's Thesis on the
evolution of learning neural networks.  I am currently
searching for a journal or conference to submit it to.
 The problem is that I can't seem to find journals
that accept papers longer than 4 pages.

Has anyone heard of any journals or conferences
accepting long papers?

Thanks,

-Chris Christenson
